title: Soothing Scent
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>*Sniff* *sniff*.... What is this? There’s a nice scent coming from you, Hanamaru-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eh? What kind of scent?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Hmm.... It’s kind of sweet.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ah, that might be incense zura. Maru has just been helping out back home.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Incense? So Incense smells like this, huh. It smells so good~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>K-, Kotori-san, it’s embarrassing if you get that close to me zura....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ah, I’m sorry, Hanamaru-chan. You just smelled really good, so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>If it’s a nice scent, then Maru is glad zura....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yeah! It feels soothing. I think it fits you perfectly, Hanamaru-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ehehe.... Then, let’s get even closer, Kotori-san~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
